languages.text: {n}Фактотум задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Есть еще несколько небольших новостей... если вы того желаете — я с радостью поведаю вам о них на мостике. Не хотелось бы тратить на них время здесь и сейчас".

{n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."
languages.original_text: {n}Фактотум задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Есть еще несколько небольших новостей... если вы того желаете — я с радостью поведаю вам о них на мостике. Не хотелось бы тратить на них время здесь и сейчас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly share them with you on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问低下头，沉思着。{/n}“还有一些其他的小小进展……如果您愿意的话，我可以和您在舰桥上谈谈。我可不希望让这些小事占用如此重要的宝贵时间。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问低下头，沉思着。{/n}“还有一些其他的小小进展……如果您愿意的话，我可以和您在舰桥上谈谈。我可不希望让这些小事占用如此重要的宝贵时间。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Das Faktotum senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Es gab einige kleinere Entwicklungen ... Wenn Ihr wünscht, kann ich Euch auf der Brücke auf den neuesten Stand bringen. Ich möchte nicht, dass sie diesen Anlass stören."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Faktotum senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Es gab einige kleinere Entwicklungen ... Wenn Ihr wünscht, kann ich Euch auf der Brücke auf den neuesten Stand bringen. Ich möchte nicht, dass sie diesen Anlass stören."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Le factotum baisse la tête, plongé dans ses pensées.{/n} « D'autres événements mineurs sont survenus... Je me ferai un plaisir de vous en dire plus sur la passerelle, si vous le souhaitez, mais pas maintenant. Je ne voudrais pas gâcher cette occasion si spéciale avec des histoires sans importance. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le factotum baisse la tête, plongé dans ses pensées.{/n} « D'autres événements mineurs sont survenus... Je me ferai un plaisir de vous en dire plus sur la passerelle, si vous le souhaitez, mais pas maintenant. Je ne voudrais pas gâcher cette occasion si spéciale avec des histoires sans importance. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}El Factótum, pensativo, agacha la cabeza.{/n} «También se han producido una serie de acontecimientos menos importantes... Si lo desea, le pondré al corriente en el puente, pero no quiero que interfieran en esta feliz ocasión».
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Factótum, pensativo, agacha la cabeza.{/n} «También se han producido una serie de acontecimientos menos importantes... Si lo desea, le pondré al corriente en el puente, pero no quiero que interfieran en esta feliz ocasión».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}ファクトタムは頭を下げて考え込んでいる。{/n}「他にも小さな進展がありました…もしお望みなら、喜んでブリッジの様子をお知らせしますよ。このチャンスからひと時の時間も奪われたくありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."

traits.locale_text: {n}ファクトタムは頭を下げて考え込んでいる。{/n}「他にも小さな進展がありました…もしお望みなら、喜んでブリッジの様子をお知らせしますよ。このチャンスからひと時の時間も奪われたくありません」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Kâhya, başını eğip düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Başka ufak gelişmeler de oldu... Dilerseniz bunları köprüde seve seve anlatırım. Kendinize ayırdığınız bu vakti çalmak istemem."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum lowers his head in thought.{/n} "There have been other minor developments... If you so wish, I will gladly bring you up to speed on the bridge. I would not want them to take any time away from this occasion."
